actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation

official_title: A bill to establish the Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site, and for other purposes.
short_title: Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site Act of 1996

summary.text: Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site Act of 1996 - Designates the Lower East Side Tenement Museum at 97 Orchard Street, New York, New York, as a national historic site. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into a cooperative agreement with the Museum designed to assure preservation and interpretation of the Site. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site Act of 1996
A bill to establish the Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site, and for other purposes.
